basics.name: Iker Gonzalez
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: As an innovative and entrepreneurial professional, I thrive when given the autonomy and freedom to take ownership of projects and make decisions that drive impactful results. I am motivated by working with individuals who push boundaries and challenge the status quo, as I believe in the power of collaboration to achieve greatness. With a highly analytical mindset, I excel at dissecting complex problems and finding creative solutions. My business-oriented approach allows me to see the bigger picture and make strategic decisions that align with organizational goals. I have a passion for lifelong learning and continuously strive to expand my knowledge and skill set. Adapting to new technologies and trends is a priority for me, as I understand the importance of staying ahead in a rapidly evolving landscape. In my portfolio, you will find evidence of my ability to innovate, take ownership, and drive results. I am excited to contribute my expertise and work alongside like-minded individuals who are dedicated to making a difference.

projects.title: Webserv - C++, Python, JS
projects.subtitle: HTTP protocol, Client-Server arquitecture, NGINX, CGI, Sockets, fcntl
highlights: Development of HTTP server from scratch using C++. Testing is made with an actual browser.

projects.title: Ft Containers - C++
projects.subtitle: Algorithms, Containers, Templates, Data-structures, Standard Template Library (STL), Operator overloading
highlights: Reimplementation of stack, vector and map container types of the C++ STL

projects.title: Cub3D - C
projects.subtitle: Raycasting, Algorithms, MiniLibX, Key Hooks, Graphic Design, Windows, Events, Mathematics
highlights: Small simulated 3D game done using raycasting principles and inspired by the famous Wolfenstein 3D game

projects.title: CPP Piscine - C++
projects.subtitle: Polymorphism, Inheritance, References, Operator overloads, Interfaces, Virtual, Exceptions, Casts, Templates, STL
highlights: 42 'piscine' which resembles a coding bootcamp on C++

projects.title: Minishell - C
projects.subtitle: Signals, Processes, Pipes, Readline
highlights: A Bash-inspired shell with a prompt and a working history
Quotes interpretation, environment variables expansion, redirections, pipes, builtins, and signals

projects.title: Philosophers - C
projects.subtitle: Multithreading, Pthread API, Mutexes, Processes, Semaphores
highlights: 42's take on the classic Dining philosophers problem
Mandatory part with threads and mutexes; bonus part with processes and semaphores

projects.title: Push Swap - C
projects.subtitle: Sorting algorithm, Linked lists
highlights: Sort data on a stack, with a limited set of instructions, using the lowest possible number of actions
The two available stacks were managed with linked lists

projects.title: So Long - C
projects.subtitle: MiniLibX
highlights: Small top-down, 2D game with textures, sprites, and basic gameplay
Move the character around and collect enough collectibles to unlock the exit
In the bonus version, a move counter is shown on the screen and enemies roam the board to kill the player

projects.title: Minitalk - C
projects.subtitle: Signals, Bitwise operations
highlights: Small data exchange program using UNIX signals and bitwise operations
A server listens for signals emitted by a client. The client receives a string as a parameter and sends it as binary to the server. The server receives the signals and output them to the console

work.name: Reprise Digital
highlights: Created a fully automated cloud solution that enabled our clients take control of their SEO endeavors
Worked with REST APIs and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) on automation and software development projects
Created an application that streamlined the process of elaborating and delivering SEO recommendations
Worked for top clients such as Real Madrid, Johnson & Johnson, Renfe or Legalitas

work.name: Aiag Asesores
work.summary: Aiag Asesores is a tech-centric small business consulting firm focused on providing tailored legal, tax, labor and bookeping services.
highlights: Build the digital presence of the company from scratch
Orquestrated back-end automations using Zapier and Google Apps Script (Javascript)
Website development and SEO (positioned first on Googlein various long tail keywords)
Developed the companies ERP with Apsheet's technology

work.name: Environment Agency
highlights: Constraints check using Easimap2 Permitting software
Environmental Impact Assessments (EIA)
Meetings between developers, Local Planning Authorities (LPA) and Environment Agency's consultees
Team working along with Biodiversity, Fisheries, Flood Risk, Strategic Planning and Groundwater Contamination teams

education.summary: Certified GCP Data Engineer adept at designing, building, and securing data systems. Skilled in operationalizing machine learning models, ensuring quality, and leveraging existing solutions.
No teachers, peer to peer learning, open 24/7, gamified project-based methodology, international network. One of the most innovative coding schools in the world.
Academic direction from The London School of Economics

volunteer.summary: CEC is the international network of the circular economy field which builds strong local clubs who design, implement and support circular local initiatives.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard. That is all.
